Highlighted Clause: The failure of replika to exercise or enforce any right or provision of these terms of service will not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
Plain Language Summary: Just because Replika doesn't immediately act to enforce a right or part of these terms doesn't mean it has given up that right.

Highlighted Clause: Upon your account deletion, cancellation of a paid subscription is effective at the end of the applicable billing period.
Plain Language Summary: If you delete your account, any paid subscription you have will only stop at the end of your current billing period.

Highlighted Clause: The service may also provide notices to you of changes to these terms of service or other matters by displaying notices or links to notices generally on the service.
Plain Language Summary: Replika might inform you about changes to the terms or other important issues by showing you a notice or link within their service.
